price: Kõ kanã tambayar su wani harãji ne (a kan iyar da Manzanci a gare su)? To, harãjin Ubangijinka ne mafi alhẽri kuma Shĩ ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu ciyarwa.
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ خَرۡجٗا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum kharjan fakharāju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
